column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Solid ramen here. I typically order vegetarian ramen
column2: and Jinya has a good option: the vegetable soup ramen. It weirdly comes topped with a handful of salad greens
column3: but once you eat your way through that (or I guess mix it in)
column4: you are left with a flavorful broth
column6: and good toppings. The Brussels sprouts appetizer is delicious!
